panels.description: Total of inventories Github repositories from applications running in the cluster.
panels.title: Repos

panels.description: Number of namespaces that contains inventoried applications.
panels.title: Namespaces

panels.description: Inventoried applications that NOT trigger alerts.

targets.expr:
max by (repo, exported_namespace, name, container_name, silenced, current_release_name, latest_release_date, latest_release_name, current_release_date) (
  count(kube_inventory_pod_versions_to_latest_release{repo=~"$repo", exported_namespace=~"$namespace", name=~"$pod", container_name=~"$container", silenced="true"}))

panels.title: Silenced

panels.description: Total of Pods in the cluster.

targets.expr: count(kube_pod_info)

panels.title: Pods (Total)

panels.description: Number of Pods that were not inventoried.

targets.expr:
count(kube_pod_info
unless on(namespace, pod)
label_replace(
  label_replace(
    kube_inventory_pod_versions_to_latest_release,
    "pod", "$1", "name", "(.*)"
  ),
  "namespace", "$1", "exported_namespace", "(.*)"
))

panels.title: Not Inv. Pods

targets.expr:
kube_pod_info
unless on(namespace, pod)
label_replace(
  label_replace(
    kube_inventory_pod_versions_to_latest_release,
    "pod", "$1", "name", "(.*)"
  ),
  "namespace", "$1", "exported_namespace", "(.*)"
)

list.description: Number of releases that triggers the alert OutdatedKubeInventoryPods.
list.label: Outdated Pods
list.name: alert_outdated_pods

list.description: Number of days that triggers the alert StaleApplicationRelease.
list.label: Stale Applications
list.name: alert_stale_applications

list.description: Number of days that triggers the alert AbandonedApplicationRelease.
list.label: Abandoned Applications
list.name: alert_abandoned_applications

list.description: Number of days to filter a current release.
list.label: Current Release Age
list.name: current_release_age

list.description: Number of days to filter a latest release.
list.label: Latest Release Age
list.name: latest_release_age
